entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 800 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 700 metres rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
